title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Mylan Probe; EpiPen Pricing (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Mylan Probe; EpiPen Pricing (Audio)
description:
Jennifer Rie, a senior litigation analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence, discusses a Justice Department Investigation into Mylan over the pricing of the EpiPen. She speaks with June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
